OffTime.description: How long the spikes stay down before going back up.

OnTime.description: How long the spikes stay up before going back down.

InitialDelay.description: How long the object waits before starting the normal active/inactive cycle.

IsEventDriven.description: Whether this object is active by default or must be triggered by something first.

ShowBase.description: Whether the base of the spikes (black plane supporting the spikes) should be visible.
